author: hustla187
title: Good Set
review: This set has alot of great and useful pieces like the motor, car, cameras and the helicopter. It is also good for your Lego town, but the backdrop looks too cartoonish to me, so I have to give this one a 4.

author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO Studios - Movie Backdrop Studio Review
review:
This is an awsome set which is a nice addition in your LEGO collection for sure. I like the way how LEGO made the background moving. We get two different background papers. One has a day scene and the other one a night scene. Both papers have a glue strip which makes it easier for you to close the background. We also get a motor which makes the background moving to the left or to the right. We also get a platform which you can use for the helicopter which comes with it. It's a cool looking helicopter and the pieces there are printed. In fact: This set doesn't include any stickers.

This set also comes with a cool looking black sports car. It does remind me a little bit of the car from the LEGO Racers videogames 1 and 2 from the character Rocket Racer. You also get a staff which is useful if you want to do a pursuit. I also can't complain about the minifigs as well. We get a police officer, a stuntman and a cameraman who comes with a camera as well. It's a cool set to have around and it's worth the money for sure.

All in all this set is an great set and I would HIGHLY recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure. Here is the link where you can check out the full gallery I made for this set on my website: http://www.klokriecher.de
